name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Accomplished Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, transitioning to a Senior Sales Engineer role. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with extensive knowledge in enterprise monitoring tools such as **Nagios**, **Datadog**, and **Splunk**. Strong background in event management and cloud infrastructure deployment, coupled with hands-on experience in **Python** and **JavaScript**. Adept at leveraging both Linux and Windows environments to ensure optimal system performance.

Renowned for delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, I bring a proven ability to communicate complex technical concepts effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. My experience includes building AI/ML-powered platforms and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines, ensuring compliance with industry standards. My strengths lie in problem-solving, strategic thinking, and fostering teamwork to enhance project outcomes.
